sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SearchService } from './services/search.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { isSlideBarNotActive: boolean = true; constructor(private searchService: SearchService) {} openSlideBar() { if (this.isSlideBarNotActive) { this.isSlideBarNotActive = false; } // use boolean for opening and closing the slide bar // create another component for slide bar make it fixed or sticky position and absolute } }
